attributes.action: Aimee Yule to be nominated for Queen's Commendation for Bravery
attributes.additional_details: After witnessing the worst behaviour the UK has to offer in August's riots we should Recognize and Honour role models in the community that display the best behaviour, such as Aimee Yule who recently put herself in a dangerous position to protect the life of a stranger who was beng assaulted in the middle of the street whilst others just walked by. The government should nominate her for the Queen's Commendation for Bravery
